keyword: calories in a pint of guinness stout
title: Calories in a Pint of Guinness Stout
meta_description: Learn the calories in a pint of Guinness stout, plus carbs, protein, sodium, and tweaks for variations like extra stout or non-alcoholic options.
h1: Calories in a Pint of Guinness Stout
assumptions: Guinness Draught, 4.2% ABV, UK pint (568 ml), standard draft pour, no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by product type, batch, serving size, and temperature. Check labels or manufacturer data for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: A pint of Guinness stout provides about 210 calories and 18 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp honey to the pour

faqs.q: How many calories in a pint of Guinness stout?
faqs.a: About 210 calories for a standard UK pint (568 ml).

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a pint of Guinness?
faqs.a: Approximately 18 g of carbohydrates, mostly from malt.

faqs.q: Does Guinness have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Low protein (~2 g per pint) and 0 g fat.

faqs.q: How does Guinness compare to other beers calorie-wise?
faqs.a: Similar to many stouts at ~210 kcal per pint; lagers may be lower (~150-180 kcal).

faqs.q: Is there cholesterol or fiber in Guinness stout?
faqs.a: 0 mg cholesterol and 0 g fiber per pint.
